column3: Latest;Siem Reap Province: A man took a knife to his throat on October 6
column6: Siem Reap City. ------The 33 year old was a knife seller originally from Battambang city
column8: who was staying with his boss in Siem Reap. ------The victim was reportedly upset after his wife asked for a divorce. After the incident
column9: the man was taken to the Siem Reap Referral Hospital.------AREY NEWS
